name: Die Totale Kippelung
description:
Hannover GameJam 2022 - Hochmut kommt vor dem Fall

High Risk
Go Fast
No Care

Rock the Chair

The teacher told you not to rock the chair
BUT WHO ARE YOU TO LISTEN??

Rock back and forth with A & D or Left & Right

Balance into the sweet zone and collect the highest score
Do you dare to enter the DANGER ZONE for MAXIMUM POINT MULTIPLICATORS?!
Those who ROCK TOO HARD will FAIL EPICLY and get scolded by the teacher


"HEIDEWIDZKA!" -Some Guy

"NiChT kiPpEln, daS iSt gEfäHrliG!" -My Elementary Teacher

"A meme firework en par with AAA games" -Totally Legit Reporter

"This S*** is bananas!" -Gwen Stefani


Idea | Art | Design: Eugen Janke

Programming | Gameplay: Darius Branning

Programming | Technical Art: Lukas Buttke

Sponsored by:

SAE Institute Hannover
Nordmedia Hannover
Hannover Impuls
APITs Labs
Jinxi.de
